childVariableDescriptors.comments:
Contains four sub-directories, 1 for each project phase, containing Actions (i.e. question with only one conditional result choice) for the corresponding phase.

WARNING: YOU SHALL NOT RE-ORDER SUBDIRECTORIES !!!

childVariableDescriptors.name: actions

DONT FORGET TO SET RESOURCE'S SKILLS !!!

Used to set some initial values that depends on others :

Initial advancement limit

  - periodLimit = max closing period value
